questions.author: James Jones
questions.content: How do you generate a model?
questions.notes: I'm new to Ember, so answer in simple terms.

questions.author: Mary
questions.content: How do you generate a route?
questions.notes: I'm using the ember cli v2.15.1.

answers.author: Jesse Lebowitz
answers.content: You generate a model by typing ember g model <name-of-model> in your terminal.

answers.author: Lenny Mike
answers.content: You generate a route by typing ember g route <name-of-model> in your terminal.
